description: BKroute, help tourist to traveling in Bangkok by transportation application on android, present idea at MEGA2014 and finalists in Samart Innovation award 2015.
html:
BKroute



BKroute, help tourist to traveling in Bangkok by transportation application on android, present idea at MEGA2014 and finalists in Samart Innovation award 2015

Team is in final round award of 20,000 bath from BKroute application. The contest involved hard work in R&D with business model, created mobile application, presentation, and marketing.

Navigate to attraction in Bangkok which fastest and cheaper route solution by bus, BTS, MRT, BRT, and Airport Link , Various transportations, Save hostel and favorites attraction, Introduce place and event in Bangkok, Notification about urgent traffic news, Thai and English language.

NOW we close this application because this application is large scale and no budget to do it.

description: health application on android and windows phone, join the competition in AIS the startup 2014
html:
healthMe


Feature are calculate bmi, WhTR, BMR ,%fat, TDEE and save user history, pedometer from running and walking to burn calories, save user recipe, measurement, about office syndrome, and shared result and recipe to facebook and twitter.

health application on android and windows phone, join the competition in AIS the startup 2014.

This project is not finish now because durate to improve feature accord with market in future which new name is “heallipe”.

description: Stop motion android application project in Mobile Developer subject.
html:
MyMotion


Stop motion android application project in Mobile Developer subject.

description: TESA HYPER CAMP 2012 by TESA and get the cooperation of FORTH Corporation Public Company Limited.
html:
IP Camera Surveillance


IP Camera Surveillance, ip camera application for android tablet, during the internship with Hyper camp 2012 project by TESA and get the cooperation of FORTH corporation public company limited.

This application features are capture image and video from camera, run backgroud with slide picture, and set time duration to application recording picture and video.

Features in my responsibility are capture photo, record video, show picture and video gallery and set time to capture from tablet to server.
